events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and have begun processing their documents.
The candidate's application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department given their software development background.
A recruiter skilled in sourcing software engineers has been assigned to manage this application moving forward.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to evaluate the candidate's experience in software development and their fit for the team.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the role and confirming availability for the next steps.
The technical interview with the engineering lead has been scheduled to assess the candidate's coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit, salary expectations, and onboarding process.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate expressing eagerness to join and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining compensation, benefits, and role expectations in the engineering team.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested clarification on some benefits and remote work policies.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and expressed excitement to start contributing to engineering projects.
Onboarding process began with the new hire being introduced to the engineering team and receiving access to necessary development tools.
The recruitment case for the software engineer was successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into their role.
